email_template.name: data_request_acknowledgement
email_template.subject: Data Request Acknowledgement | Ticket #{{ticket_id}}
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}}, your data request (Ticket #{{ticket_id}}) has been received and is under review.

You can monitor the status of your ticket at: https://data.gov.my/data-request
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Thank you for submitting your data request (Ticket #{{ticket_id}}). You can monitor the status of your ticket at: https://data.gov.my/data-request

Details:

Name: {{name}}

Email: {{email}}

Institution: {{institution}}

Dataset Title: {{dataset_title}}

Dataset Description: {{dataset_description}}

Agency: {{agency}}

Purpose of Request: {{purpose_of_request}}

Regards,
Public Sector Data Team

email_template.name: data_request_acknowledgement
email_template.subject: Pengesahan Penerimaan Permintaan Data | Tiket #{{ticket_id}}

Salam sejahtera, {{name}}. Permintaan data anda (Tiket #{{ticket_id}}) telah diterima dan sedang dalam proses kajian. Kami akan memberitahu anda sekiranya terdapat sebarang perubahan dalam status.

Anda boleh memantau status tiket anda di: https://data.gov.my/data-request

Salam sejahtera, {{name}}

Terima kasih kerana menghantar permintaan data anda (Tiket #{{ticket_id}}). Anda boleh memantau status tiket anda di: https://data.gov.my/data-request
